caption.p: Anxiolytic effects of Tragia involucrata L. leaves. (A) Number of open arm entry, (B) Time spent in open arm, (C) Number of close arm entry. Data are shown as mean ± SEM. ∗ denotes p < 0.05 vs control, ∗∗ denotes p < 0.01 vs control, ∗∗∗ denotes p < 0.001 vs control (One way ANOVA followed by Dunnett t-test).
